sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this chapter, the term:(1)“Alteration” means any change or addition to the vertical conveyance other than maintenance, repair, or replacement
sections.text: (2)“Certificate of operation” means a document issued by the department which indicates that the conveyance has had the required safety inspection

sections.heading: Penalties. (1)Any person who violates any of the provisions of this chapter or the rules of the department is guilty of a misdemeanor of the second degree, punishable as provided in s
sections.text: 775.082 or s. 775.083.(2)Any person who falsely represents himself or herself as credentialed under this chapter is guilty of
